member.name: T:DPFP.Verification.Verification
member.summary: Performs the system function of fingerprint verification, which is a one-to-one comparison of a fingerprint feature set with a fingerprint template produced at enrollment that returns a decision of match or non-match.

member.name: F:DPFP.Verification.Verification.ProbabilityNotSet
member.summary: Use this value to specify the default FAR threshold

member.name: M:DPFP.Verification.Verification.Verify(DPFP.FeatureSet,DPFP.Template)
member.summary: Performs fingerprint verification and returns the comparison decision based on the default FAR threshold

member.name: M:DPFP.Verification.Verification.Verify(DPFP.FeatureSet,DPFP.Template,System.Int32)
member.summary: Performs fingerprint verification and returns the comparison decision based on the specified FAR threshold
member.param: False Accept probability threshold or ProbabilityNotSet to use the default threshold

member.name: M:DPFP.Verification.Verification.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Verification class for comparing a fingerprint feature set with a fingerprint template using the default value of the false accept rate (FAR)

member.name: M:DPFP.Verification.Verification.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Verification class for comparing a fingerprint feature set with a fingerprint template and assigns the value of the FAR

member.name: M:DPFP.Verification.Verification.Verify(DPFP.FeatureSet,DPFP.Template,DPFP.Verification.Verification.Result@)
member.summary: Performs the system function of fingerprint verification and specifies a comparison decision based on the FAR set by the FARRequested property

member.name: P:DPFP.Verification.Verification.FARRequested
member.summary: Returns or assigns the requested false accept rate (FAR)

member.name: T:DPFP.Verification.Verification.Result
member.summary: Represents the results of a fingerprint verification operation.

member.name: P:DPFP.Verification.Verification.Result.FARAchieved
member.summary: Returns or assigns the value of the achieved FAR for a comparison operation.

member.name: P:DPFP.Verification.Verification.Result.Verified
member.summary: Returns or assigns the comparison decision, which indicates whether the comparison of a fingerprint feature set and a fingerprint template resulted in a decision of match or non-match. This decision is based on the value of the FARRequested property

member.name: T:DPFP.DPFPVerificationResources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:DPFP.DPFPVerificationResources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:DPFP.DPFPVerificationResources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:DPFP.DPFPVerificationResources.DPFPErrorMessage_FailedContext
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Failed to create a context.

member.name: P:DPFP.DPFPVerificationResources.DPFPErrorMessage_FailedInit
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Failed to initialize low level API.

member.name: P:DPFP.DPFPVerificationResources.DPFPErrorMessage_FailedVerification
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Verification Failure.
